snippet: The unexpected leak has raised questions about who caused it, whether they meant to embarrass the pope and if it portends larger fights to come.
abstract: Leak of Pope Francis' message on environment creates tension in Vatican, among both staff members and reporters, who criticized others for breaking promise not to publish before release of final document.

byline.original: By JIM YARDLEY and ELISABETTA POVOLEDO
byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Rome.

lead_paragraph: The unexpected leak has raised questions about who caused it, whether they meant to embarrass the pope and if it portends larger fights to come.

headline.main: Leak of Pope’s Encyclical on Climate Change Hints at Tensions in Vatican
headline.print_headline: Leak of Pope’s Message on Environment Hints at Tensions in Vatican
